name: Project Pound
description:
Created for the USF vs UCF Game Jam Summer 2018

CONTROLS:

For Player 1:
WASD to move
E to pick a tile
R to spawn the next tile instantly
4 to Either hold the current order or swap the current order with your held order

For Player 2:
IJKL to move
O to pick a tile
P to spawn the next tile instantly
0 to Either hold the current order or swap the current order with your held order

For either player:
Press Space to Pause

GOAL:
Get as high of a score as possible without overflowing in various modes
Tip:  Get a multiplier/combo going by matching the tile with the current order

When done with a match, press Q to go to the menu screen.

HELP Section contains the same information above.
